name: Coleman 28 QT Extreme Cooler
description: Bring the party to the beach, BBQ or campground. Tall enough to keep 2L bottles upright, this Coleman® cooler has a beefy 14L compartment to stash 36 cans (or a whole lot of potato salad). Insulation in the walls keeps ice chilly up to 3 days in summer temps – excellent for road trips or weekends when you’re a long way from the nearest store. The lid is sturdy enough to double as a chair to sit back and toast your prime campsite.Xtreme® technology holds in cold for 3 days in temperatures up to 32°C.ThermoZone™ insulation contains no ozone-depleting CFCs, HFCx or HCFCs.Lid supports up to 113kg (250lb.).2 cup holders are 5cm deep.Comfort grip handle is easy to carry.
